fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique identifier for this organisation. This is important to enable data on funders and recipients to be linked up across different grant-makers. The [Organisation Identifier Standard](http://www.threesixtygiving.org/standard/identifiers/#toc-organisation-identifier) guidance explains how to create this ID, based either on the known company or charity number, or upon identifiers held in the grant-maker's internal systems.
fields.title: Identifier

fields.name: department
fields.description: The department or sub-unit of this organisation making or receiving the grant.
fields.title: Department

fields.name: companyNumber
fields.description: Registered UK company number, if applicable.
fields.title: Company Number

fields.name: postalCode
fields.description: Postal code (please try and provide a post code whenever possible)
fields.title: Postal Code

fields.name: alternateName
fields.description: An alternative name for this organisation (e.g. trading name)
fields.title: Alternate Name

fields.name: description
fields.description: A short description of this organisation and its area of work
fields.title: Description

fields.name: organisationType
fields.title: Organisation Type
fields.allowed_values: Registered Charity,Registered Company,Community Group,List to be updated

fields.name: url
fields.description: A web address for the Organisation
fields.title: Web Address
